snippet: The search giant will receive $1 million in full-page advertising space in USA Today after its submission won a contest.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; Google Creative Lab unit of the search giant receives $1 million in full-page advertising space in USA Today after wining a contest that coincided with a redesign of the newspaper; winning ad promotes Google Plus Hangout service as an alternative to in-person meetings.
lead_paragraph: The search giant will receive $1 million in full-page advertising space in USA Today after its submission won a contest.

headline.seo: Google, Seen as Print’s Nemesis, Is Honored by USA Today for Creativity
headline.main: On Print’s Turf, Google Wins for Creativity
headline.print_headline: On Print’s Turf, Google Wins For Creativity
